title: Gangplank & Skins are Unavailable
body:
I tried to buy Gangplank so I could get his free skin ( mentioned at http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/gangplank-returns-and-event-end-draws-near ) but he doesn't appear in the shop at all.
http://imgur.com/sfQVB3n
 
If you go to Available Champions ( because he's currently free ) you can click him, but everything says Unavailable.
http://imgur.com/RZRx1bV
 
Anyone know anything about this?

replies.body: How? The launcher shows 5.14, not 5.15 and I don't see an option to get 5.15.
It's just a normal patch, so it shouldn't be too hard on your computer. :] As The AFK Farmer mentioned, if you're on an older build, the updated content can't be applied.
I played as Gangplank while he was Unavailable, but still didn't have access to him after the match. I repaired the files and it works now. So thank you. The launcher still says 5.14 though.
Hmmm. Interesting. As long as you're good to go and on your way to getting your rewards. :D
Log out and log back in. If your computer is old or your network is slow, it could take some time.
